document.full_text: major league baseball (mlb), in an extraordinary move, plans to take control of the day-to-day operations of the los angeles dodgers because of mounting concern over the franchise's financial plight.
document.title: mlb to assume day-to-day control of dodgers
lines_and_colors: major league baseball (mlb), in an extraordinary move, plans to take control of the day-to-day operations of the los angeles dodgers because of mounting concern over the franchise's financial plight.
